channel.title: Ivo Weaver on Lisa's Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in Ivo Weaver on Lisa's Notebook

item.title: On not bullshitting about ‘On Bullshit’
item.description: Ivo Wever (@Confusionist) offered the following objection to yesterday’s post: Could Krauss be ‘sincere, inconsistent and wrong’ instead of ‘a bullshitter’? He may not have realized he had given insufficient thought to the matter until strongly challenged? If motivation doesn’t matter, aren’t we all bullshitters at times? — Ivo Wever (@Confusionist) July 9, 2020 Could Krauss be ‘sincere, inconsistent and wrong’ instead of ‘a bullshitter’? He may not have realized he had given insufficient thought to the matter until strongly challenged?
